title: Stuck in a Loop of Downloading the same 6 GB
body: When I launch my client and get in the login screen, it says something is wrong with my files, so I then install about 6 GB of the files and when I finally get into the main client, I can't click play because it says I need to install the filed. I have repeated this cycle 7 times with no success. This comes first: http://prntscr.com/i57m0u and then this happens after I try to play http://prntscr.com/i57m8i closing the client and reopening it triggers the 6 gb download to occur again.

replies.body:
That can sometimes happen if your network is having problems successfully downloading all of the game files without any errors. If it has any hiccups or slight interruptions during patching/downloading, some of the files might get lost causing this repatch. Do me a favor and update your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 and then [**either disable or add exceptions to your firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq3) for League.

Let me know if you're still getting stuck in this loop after those two steps, and we might need to try a full clean uninstall/reinstall.
Yeah, thanks for the reply. Unfortunately, the steps didn't work. I also tried a full repair, but it could not install. Now I have no idea what to do, nothing I've tried works.

Hmmm alrighty. Sounds like we might have to hit this a bit harder than I hoped to fix it. Grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and make sure to run it with the options **clean uninstall and reinstall** checked. That should remove any corrupted files that are preventing you from installing correctly.
Thanks so much, it finally works now!
